title: An Online Photo Gallery of Italy’s New Churches
post: IMO, at 73 years of age, none of the churches shown really look like churches on the outside. However what is important is what takes place on the inside.  If I lived nearby and attended one as my Parish Church, my opinion might be different.  As for the photo with Christs facial image, I interpret it as Christs head facing forward.
author: Emmett McMahon
